unnormalised: Okay, here's my take on return policies:
normalised: Okay, here's my take on return policies:

unnormalised: Arre yaar, return policies, right? Last Diwali, I bought a saree from "Sarees Unlimited" online. Colour looked different on my phone! Thankfully, their return was easy. Imagine, you order biryani and it's just…off. You expect a refund, no? Good return policies are crucial, like a good Onam Sadhya. Everyone should have one. Makes shopping less stressful!
normalised: Arre yaar, return policies, right? Last Diwali, I bought a saree from "Sarees Unlimited" online. Colour looked different on my phone! Thankfully, their return was easy. Imagine, you order biryani and it's just…off. You expect a refund, no? Good return policies are crucial, like a good Onam Sadhya. Everyone should have one. Makes shopping less stressful!
